summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Ten Thousand ($10,000.00) Dollars out of the General Fund of the City of Seattle, in favor of Municipal Light Extension Fund Series G of said city, for the purpose of paying the semi-annual interest on Five Hundred Thousand ($500,000.00) Dollars Municipal Light Extension Fund Series G @ 4% per annum of the issue of 1909, which interest is due and payable at the office of Fiscal Agency of State of Washington in New York City on October 1, 1909.
